_sText:
This is a remake of the mortar effect in dod_strand. just like in dod the mortar can be destroyed.

The zip includes a readme and 2 prefabs (1 for the mortar and 1 for the mortarfield).

note that all additional effects like sounds and the flying mortar must be added by yourself. (only the incoming sound at the field is included).

Have fun and make some nice effects.
